# Fuel poverty layers
```{r plot-lsoas, fig.width=7, fig.height=7}
load("data/lads.RData")
load("data/lsoa.RData")
ggplot2::ggplot() +
  ggplot2::geom_polygon(data = lsoa_f, ggplot2::aes(long, lat, group = group,
                                                    fill = per_fph),
                        colour = NA) +
  ggplot2::geom_polygon(data = lads_f, ggplot2::aes(long, lat, group = group),
                        fill = "transparent", colour = "black") +
  ggplot2::coord_equal()
```
